meanings.definition: The curd made from mashed soybeans, used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: I added some tofus to the stir-fry for extra protein.
meanings.sent2: She made a delicious tofu scramble for breakfast.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to steal the tofus from the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like the tofus in the soup, blending seamlessly with everything.
meanings.sent5: The tofus in the salad were like little blocks of flavor.

meanings.definition: A dish made with tofu as the main ingredient.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant's specialty was a spicy tofu stir-fry.
meanings.sent2: I love ordering tofu pad thai from my favorite takeout place.
meanings.sent3: The tofu dish was so good, it made me want to learn how to cook.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity in the kitchen turned plain tofu into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The tofu dish was a symphony of flavors in my mouth.

meanings.sent1: She bought two tofus from the store for the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The tofus in the fridge were ready to be used for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The tofus on the plate looked like little white cubes.
meanings.sent4: The tofus in the dish added a creamy texture to the meal.
meanings.sent5: The tofus were the star of the vegetarian feast.
